title: 2" Purdy 144080220 Nylox Dale Angled Sash Paint Brush, Tynex Nylon
features: PURDY NYLOX PAINT BRUSHES - Purdy Nylox brushes are designed to provide a smooth, flawless finish. These paint applicators will help you get the job done right the first time.
DESIGNED FOR LATEX PAINTS - Featuring alderwood handles and stainless steel ferrules, these painting brushes are perfect for any interior project and work best with latex paint and primers.

SOFT BRISTLES - Made with 100% nylon filaments, the soft bristles are carefully tipped and flagged for long-lasting, quality performance. Perfect for the DIY-er or the professional painter, this painters brush leaves an ultra-smooth finish.
IDEAL USES - Handcrafted in the USA with global materials, this Purdy paint brush is ideal for interior windows, doors and trim.

PURDY - From the first Purdy brush built in 1925 to the wide range of painting supplies and products we make today, one thing has stayed true - our dedication to craft and quality. And it's still at the heart of every tool we make.
description: Purdy Nylox brushes are designed to provide a smooth, flawless finish. Made with 100% nylon filaments, the soft bristles are carefully tipped and flagged for long-lasting, quality performance. Featuring alderwood handles and stainless steel ferrules, these paintbrushes are perfect for any interior project and work best with latex paint and primers. Ideal for interior windows, doors and trim. Handcrafted in the USA with global materials, every Purdy brush is signed by the person who made it. It’s a symbol of our commitment to creating the best painting experience.

Only 100% solid, round, tapered (SRT) Tynex nylon by DuPont is used at Purdy. Carefully tipped and flagged by Purdy craftspeople, Nylox filament provides greater abrasion resistance for increased wearability while its famous Satin-Edge finish provides the excellent painting performance only found in such chiseled, handcrafted painting tools.
